entry.content:
September 21, 3517

Your spacecraft collided with the asteroid belt, and you woke up from the low-temperature hibernation chamber.

When you come to the cockpit, the central control computer that reported a serious error, accompanied by bursts of harsh alarms, instantly pulls you back to the sober reality.

The spacecraft condition monitoring shows that there are many serious structural damages, the life support system fails, and the oxygen concentration is decreasing. At the critical moment, you have four choices.

Be left to God's mercy
[Repair the damaged ship]

[Send a distress signal]
